tag_professor: Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  Tough Grader (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (2)  Get ready to read (2)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)
stu_tags: ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS  LOTS OF HOMEWORK  GET READY TO READ
comments: BEWARE UNDERGRADS, this is a graduate level class and is definitely something to schedule in a lighter-load semester. this is conceptually-based stats! Homework takes days, and is handed out weekly. The tests do assess the material though. Hicks is a great professor, but he will go thru material fast. MAKE FRIENDS & DO HMWK TOGETHER!!!

tag_professor: Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  Tough Grader (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (2)  Get ready to read (2)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)
stu_tags: SKIP CLASS? YOU WON\'T PASS.  LOTS OF HOMEWORK  TOUGH GRADER
comments: I enrolled in this class because I enjoyed my last statistics class and I am good at math. This class is heavily based in theory. I have never worked so hard in a class, took me days to do homework. Tests are tricky and will combine multiple concepts. He lectures in a technical way and it is very easy to get lost. Study guides are very broad.

tag_professor: Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  Tough Grader (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (2)  Get ready to read (2)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)
stu_tags: TOUGH GRADER  GET READY TO READ  SKIP CLASS? YOU WON\'T PASS.
comments: If you attend every lecture and actually pay attention, it should not be hard to make an A or B. You have to really read the textbook because many concepts from the textbook and not from the lecture will appear on the exam. He grades fairly and gives extra credit. He\'s really clear when he lectures and allows for discussion if needed.

tag_professor: Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  Tough Grader (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (2)  Get ready to read (2)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)
comments: Makes what could be a boring class and material easy to understand and pay attention to. No study guide was a bummer

tag_professor: Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  Tough Grader (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (2)  Get ready to read (2)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)
comments: very hard class. not just scantron test. lots of short answers.. one of the hardest classes ive taken at LSU ..

tag_professor: Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  Tough Grader (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (2)  Get ready to read (2)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)
comments: This was one of the most difficult classes I\'ve taken in my undergraduate career. I made an A but it wasn\'t achieved easily. He is very picky about the information he wants you to know and is a tough grader. It\'s not impossible to make an A in his class (because he has HUGE curves) but you have to work very hard. Still learned a lot though.

tag_professor: Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  Tough Grader (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (2)  Get ready to read (2)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)
comments: The tests (3) were hard, wtih fill in the blank, essay and a few mc. The quizzes were so hard and given weekly. Thats what killed my grade. But, I went to every class and studied but I didnt realize how hard the first test would be and got a 62. the rest of mine were C\'s but my final grade was a 69 and I needed a 69.5 and he did not give it 2 me.
